roleset.name: trust someone with something
roleset.note: TRUST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'trust' based on sentences in wsj and automaticexpansion via verbnet. (from trust.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: trust X to Y
example.text: Congress never fully trusted former CIA chief William Casey and National Security Adviser John Poindexter to honor the ban.
example.arg: former CIA chief William Casey and National Security Adviser John Poindexter

example.name: same with passive extraction
example.text: ``[She]-1 can no longer be trusted *trace*-1 to behave in a civilised -- that is unflaky -- fashion when abroad.''
example.arg: to behave in a civilised -- that is unflaky -- fashion when abroad

example.name: trust with
example.text: John trusted Mary with his prized collection of bottlecaps.
example.arg: with his prized collection of bottlecaps

example.name: different trust to
example.text: John trusted his prized collection of bottle caps to Mary.
example.arg: his prized collection of bottle caps

roleset.name: put faith in
roleset.note: TRUST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'trust' based on sentences in wsj and automaticexpansion via verbnet. (from trust.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: pretty simple
example.text: ``I don't trust people who don't eat,'' said Ms. Volokh, though she herself stopped eating lunch a few years ago to drop 25 pounds.

example.name: oddly intransitive
example.text: In the end, after meeting with the former housekeeper, Stevens sits by the seashore at dusk, thinking of her and of his employer, and declares ``I trusted.

example.name: PP variant
example.text: I trusted in his lordship's wisdom...

roleset.name: worthy of trust
roleset.note: TRUSTWORTHY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on untrustworthy.01. (from trustworthy.01-j)

role.descr: what arg1 upholds, preserves, carries through with

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: Yes. I personally know of one who-1 [*-1] is trustworthy with an infant.

example.name: args1, 2
example.text: What indicates to you that a person is trustworthy to do business with when you view their LinkedIn profile?
